name: Zaliar C
description:
Zaliar C is a kind of Galaxian clone. So it's a shmup.

Controls :

-Left and right keys to move

-"D" to fire (Auto-fire don't kill your keyboard) or "A" on a gamepad

-"Space/Start" to start or pause/unpause the game

-"Escape/Select" to quit

-"F/Left shoulder" to toggle fullscreen
